args:
Mym declares herself changed after meeting
the prince, and Prometheus finds himself in
agreement. He realizes then how to coexist with
humans, and grows closer to being the dragon
he wishes to be. For this, he offers the prince
earnest words of gratitude.
Wherever could he have gone?\nI haven't confessed my love to him today!
Back at that again, are you?
If you're planning to launch into some\nboring lecture, you can save it, because\nI can't hear you! La la la laaaaaa!
This is VALENTINE'S, sir! It is a busy time\nfor lovestruck maidens such as myself.
Ah, yes. The annual event where humans\nexchange expressions of mutual\nadmiration for one another.
Is the prince truly so important to you?
I will admit he has his share of\nfiner qualities...
However, he remains a frail human still.
Does it not shame you to be so\nbesotted by such a creature?
And I'll thank you not to call him ＂frail.＂\nHe is stronger than you know.
He doesn't think twice about his own\nsafety if it means helping others.
Of course, this means he is often in\ngrave danger—but so long as I am\nthere to assist him, all will be well.
Honestly, I used to wonder about\nhumanity as you do now.
But I changed when I met my darling.\nHe made it POSSIBLE for me to change.
Is it not the same for you?
For so long, you wanted nothing to do\nwith humans, and yet now you stay in\nthis castle.
There's nothing wrong with acknowledging\nhow much you've changed.
Well, you can do as you will.\nBut I will continue to profess\nmy love to all who have ears!
For my love is strong enough to completely\ntransform even the soul of a dragon!
And I will not rest until he is mine.
That said, I still can't find my darling\nanywhere. Where DID he run off to?!
THERE you are! Now stand still while\nI shower you with a thousand affections!
Well, I'm sure they can wait for...\nNo? They can't wait? Oh, very well.
It helped to have Prometheus with us.
Especially when he ain't fightin' all\nreckless like he did before.
I suppose that is true,\nnow that you mention it.
What, didn't ya notice? Figured ya woulda\npicked up on it all by yer lonesome.
Still, it was a huge help, so thanks.
No, it is merely that... Hmm.\nPerhaps I HAVE changed.
...Ah, here you are. I was hoping for\na chance to speak with you.
It seems I am changing as I forge\nrelationships with people in this castle.

I had come to fear hurting others and
being hurt in turn, and so believed it
would be easier for me to simply avoid
human entanglements altogether.
And yet, now that I was coerced to\ncome here and meet you...
Well, it feels as if I'm growing closer to\nbeing the kind of dragon I wish to be.
I have changed since meeting you.\nYou made this possible.
Well, well. What have we here?
What's this lovely atmosphere I'm sensing\nbetween you two? Perhaps the spirit of\nValentine's has spread even here!
Enough! I see what has happened...\nYou met my darling and were able to\nchange, which means you LOVE him!
This is nothing of the sort!
Silence! I'll not have you shower him with\ntender words that are mine to give!
I'll NEVER allow it, Prometheus!\nI won't give you my darling—not ever!
She has utterly lost her mind...\nDo something, {player_name}!
The crime of spoiling my Valentine's is\npunishable by death...SO GET READY!
Now that THAT meddler has been roasted\nand toasted, my darling and I can enjoy a\nwhite-hot Valentine's roman... Huh?
I am a flame dragon. I do not burn.
Well, I suppose I'll let your insubordination\nslide this one time.
My darling looked so happy, after all...
